===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=たてがみいぬ|鬣|tr1=tategami|t1=standing hair” → “[[mane]]|犬|tr2=inu|t2=dog}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Compare {{cog|zh|鬣狗}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|たてがみいぬ|acc=4|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|たてがみ.いぬ|タテガミ.イヌ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=たてがみいぬ|rare}} [[hyena]]

====Usage notes====
This term is rarely used anymore, having been replaced by {{ja-r|ハイエナ}} borrowed from English.

{{U:ja:biology|タテガミイヌ}}
